name: Custom Song Folder
description: Save songs and SFX to a custom directory

custom-folder.name: Custom Song Directory
custom-folder.description: The directory in which custom songs and SFX will be stored.

migrate-folder.name: Migrate From Directory
migrate-folder.description: The directory from which songs and SFX will be migrated to your <cy>custom save directory</c>.

button-setting.name: Migrate Songs
button-setting.description:
Pressing the <co>Migrate</c> button will move all songs from the <cg>'migrate from' directory</c> to your <co>custom save directory.</c>
Files in the <cy>desination folder</c> with the same name will be <cr>overwritten</c>.
